body_html:
Our build is too heavy for travis(would take hours), so we use a different CI for our official builds.
Since on our side, we exclusively use debian based distros, we keep it working for these but centos issues are invisible to us.
However, if anyone would like to maintain a centos build (non merge blocking) I am happy to help you setup webhooks from TF repo, and I am happy to expedite review of fixes on rhel/centos

body:
Our build is too heavy for travis(would take hours), so we use a different CI for our official builds.
Since on our side, we exclusively use debian based distros, we keep it working for these but centos issues are invisible to us.
However, if anyone would like to maintain a centos build (non merge blocking) I am happy to help you setup webhooks from TF repo, and I am happy to expedite review of fixes on rhel/centos
